mapper.select: select id, teacherid, classid, subject, week, startTime, endTime, created_time, updated_time, updated_person from class_real_teacher where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into class_real_teacher(teacherid, classid, subject, week, startTime, endTime, created_time, updated_time, updated_person) values (#{teacherid}, #{classid}, #{subject}, #{week}, #{starttime}, #{endtime}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime}, #{updatedPerson})

(#{entity.teacherid}, #{entity.classid}, #{entity.subject}, #{entity.week}, #{entity.starttime}, #{entity.endtime}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updatedTime}, #{entity.updatedPerson})

insert into class_real_teacher(teacherid, classid, subject, week, startTime, endTime, created_time, updated_time, updated_person) values
(#{entity.teacherid}, #{entity.classid}, #{entity.subject}, #{entity.week}, #{entity.starttime}, #{entity.endtime}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updatedTime}, #{entity.updatedPerson})
on duplicate key update teacherid = values(teacherid), classid = values(classid), subject = values(subject), week = values(week), startTime = values(startTime), endTime = values(endTime), created_time = values(created_time), updated_time = values(updated_time), updated_person = values(updated_person)

teacherid = #{teacherid},
classid = #{classid},
subject = #{subject},
week = #{week},
startTime = #{starttime},
endTime = #{endtime},
created_time = #{createdTime},
updated_time = #{updatedTime},

where id = #{id}
